reconstruction-text-1: At the moment the site is being maintained. We're sorry for any inconvenience.

reconstruction-text-2: Full information is available at the LATVIAN SENSUAL DANCE FESTIVAL "ON THE WAVE" on Facebook.

reconstruction-text-3: For all requests regarding passes and any other questions please contact us by Email: info@bachatakizomba.com

index-news-1-text: All workshops and parties wil be held in one place.

index-news-3-text: Opportunity to purchase one united pass to all festivals in Latvia for super price.
